Reviewdata.name: Andhadhun(India)
Reviewdata.Synopsis: A visually impared pianist’s world careens into a series of shocking twists after he unintentionally lands at the murder scene of a former film star.

Reviewdata.name: Train to Busan (South Korea)
Reviewdata.Synopsis: As a zombie outbreak sweeps the country, a dad and his daughter take a harrowing train journey in an attempt to reach the only city that’s still safe.
